languages.text: "Мы гасили огонь как могли... но проигрывали. И тогда Эльси взяла меня за руку, поцеловала, после чего бросилась в пекло и активировала аварийную заслонку. Мы остались снаружи, а она... продула отсек". {n}Энрих нежно улыбается, глядя в дым.{/n} "Такая история".

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."
languages.original_text: "Мы гасили огонь как могли... но проигрывали. И тогда Эльси взяла меня за руку, поцеловала, после чего бросилась в пекло и активировала аварийную заслонку. Мы остались снаружи, а она... продула отсек". {n}Энрих нежно улыбается, глядя в дым.{/n} "Такая история".

traits.locale_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. And then Elsie took my hand, kissed it, then rushed into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside, and she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich smiles gently, looking at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. And then Elsie took my hand, kissed it, then rushed into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside, and she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich smiles gently, looking at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed it, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed it, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

"We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

languages.text: "Wir haben versucht, das Feuer zu löschen, aber keine Chance. Plötzlich nahm Elsie meine Hand und küsste mich, bevor sie direkt in das Inferno rannte und die Drucktür aktivierte. Wir blieben draußen, während sie ... das Modul dekomprimiert hat." {n}Einrich lächelt dich sanft an und betrachtet den Rauch.{/n} "Das war eine ziemliche Geschichte."
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben versucht, das Feuer zu löschen, aber keine Chance. Plötzlich nahm Elsie meine Hand und küsste mich, bevor sie direkt in das Inferno rannte und die Drucktür aktivierte. Wir blieben draußen, während sie ... das Modul dekomprimiert hat." {n}Einrich lächelt dich sanft an und betrachtet den Rauch.{/n} "Das war eine ziemliche Geschichte."

languages.text: « Nous avons fait des pieds et des mains pour l'éteindre, mais la partie était mal engagée. Soudain, Elsie a pris ma main, elle m'a embrassé et elle s'est précipitée dans le brasier pour activer la porte coupe-feu. Nous sommes restés à l'extérieur pendant qu'elle... dépressurisait le compartiment. » {n}Un doux sourire aux lèvres, Einrich fixe la fumée du regard.{/n} « Drôle d'histoire, en vérité. »
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons fait des pieds et des mains pour l'éteindre, mais la partie était mal engagée. Soudain, Elsie a pris ma main, elle m'a embrassé et elle s'est précipitée dans le brasier pour activer la porte coupe-feu. Nous sommes restés à l'extérieur pendant qu'elle... ventilait le compartiment. » {n}Un doux sourire aux lèvres, Einrich fixe la fumée du regard.{/n} « Drôle d'histoire, en vérité. »

languages.text: «Hicimos lo que pudimos por apagar el fuego, pero era una lucha perdida. De repente, Elsie me agarró de la mano, me besó y luego se lanzó de cabeza a las llamas para activar el cierre de la compuerta de emergencia. Los demás nos quedamos fuera mientras ella... expuso el interior del compartimento al vacío». {n}Einrich observa el humo, esbozando una sonrisa de ternura.{/n} «Fue una verdadera hazaña».
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

traits.locale_text: «Hicimos lo que pudimos por apagar el fuego, pero era una lucha perdida. De repente, Elsie me agarró de la mano, me besó y luego se lanzó de cabeza a las llamas para activar el cierre de la compuerta de emergencia. Los demás nos quedamos fuera mientras ella... expuso el interior del compartimento al vacío». {n}Einrich observa el humo, esbozando una sonrisa de ternura.{/n} «Fue una verdadera hazaña».

languages.text: 「可能な限り火を消しましたが、もう限界でした。唐突にエルシーが私の手を取り、キスをするとそのまま炎の中に飛び込んで非常用ブラストドアを作動させました。私たちは外にいたのです。彼女が…区画を排気する間」{n}アインリッヒは柔らかく微笑み、煙をじっと見つめる。{/n}「なかなかの話でしょう」
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

traits.locale_text: 「可能な限り火を消しましたが、もう限界でした。唐突にエルシーが私の手を取り、キスをするとそのまま炎の中に飛び込んで非常用ブラストドアを作動させました。私たちは外にいたのです。彼女が…区画を排気する間」{n}アインリッヒは柔らかく微笑み、煙をじっと見つめる。{/n}「なかなかの話でしょう」

languages.text: “我们尽我们最大努力灭火，但火势还是越来越大。突然之间，埃尔茜抓住了我的手，吻了我一下，之后径自跑进火场里，打开了紧急防爆门。我们被关在了外面，而她……把整个船舱都减压了。”{n}艾因里奇凝视着烟雾，露出了温柔的笑容。{/n}“这可真是个了不起的故事。”
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."

traits.locale_text: “我们尽我们最大努力灭火，但火势还是越来越大。突然之间，埃尔茜抓住了我的手，吻了我一下，之后径自跑进火场里，打开了紧急防爆门。我们被关在了外面，而她……把整个船舱都减压了。”{n}艾因里奇凝视着烟雾，露出了温柔的笑容。{/n}“这可真是个了不起的故事。”

languages.text: "Yangını elimizden geldiğince söndürdük ama zor durumdaydık. Aniden Elsie elimi tuttu, beni öptü ve alevlere doğru koşarak acil çıkış kapısını açtı. Biz dışarıdayken kompartımanın... Havasını boşalttı." {n}Einrich, dumanı izlerken sıcak bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Acayip bir olaydı."
languages.original_text: "We put out the fire as best we could, but we were losing. Suddenly, Elsie took my hand, kissed me, and then ran straight into the blaze and activated the emergency blast door. We stayed outside while she... vented the compartment." {n}Einrich gives a tender smile, gazing at the smoke.{/n} "It was quite a story."
